In the future, the zombies overcome (a lot!) Humans in number and every day is a struggle to secure tomorrow. When you are about to give up his daily battle, John Knox ends up being saved by a group of survivors led by a mysterious man named Moses. Solitary by nature, he reluctantly joins the group. But will have to fight alongside them when a gang of maniacs attacked his hideout, catching everyone in its path. Now, Knox and his new teammates will have to use all the resources at hand (including zombies!) To rescue the victims of a real fortress.
